MaryJane Mwangi, nakwa Mary Jane Mwangi, bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na Kenya, bụ onye jere ozi dị ka onye nchịkwa na onye isi nchịkwa nke National Oil Corporation of Kenya, site na Augusiti 2017 ruo Okotomber 2019
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Nairobi na Master of Business Administration na 2006
Ọ na-ejidekwa Diploma Higher na Human Resource Management, nke e nyere na 2013, site na Institute of Human Resource Management (IHRM), nke dabeere na Nairobi, isi obodo Kenya na obodo kacha ukwuu

Ọ malitere ogologo ọrụ ya na mpaghara mmanụ ndị ahịa na 1993, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa mbupụ maka Agip Kenya Limited (AGKL), onye na-ahụ maka ikesa mmanụ na mmanụ sitere na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri dị na Mombasa ruo mba ise na mpaghara nnukwu ọdọ mmiri Africa, na-eje ozi
Ruo otu afọ, site na 1998 ruo 1999, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa ọrụ ahịa na AGKL
N'afọ sochirinụ, site na 1999 ruo 2000, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nlekọta LPG na AGKL
Na afọ 2000, ọ gbanwere ụlọ ọrụ wee kwaga Shell / BP, dị ka onye njikwa LPG, dabere na obodo Malindi dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo 2001
Na 2001 ọ kwagara ọzọ, na-akwaga na Chevron / Caltex Kenya Limited, dị ka onye na-ahụ maka azụmaahịa ahịa, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ afọ asaa
N'afọ 2008, a họpụtara Mwangi ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke ngalaba ire ahịa na ahịa na National Oil Corporation of Kenya (NOCK), na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ afọ ise na-abịa
Na onwa July 2013, a kwalitere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi njikwa, Downstream Operations na NOCK, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo July 2016, mgbe a họpụtara ya Onye isi nchịkwa na onye na-arụ ọrụ

Mgbe ọ rụsịrị ọrụ ike na otu afọ, ndị ụlọ ọrụ NOCK kwadoro Mwangi, dị ka onye isi isi na onye isi njikwa, maka afọ atọ dị irè na ubochi nke mbụ na onwa August 2017, nọchiri Sumayya Hassan-Athmani, onye gbara arụkwaghịm na July 2016
Na July 2016, n'ikike ya dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ CEO, ọ sonyeere na ndị isi oche nke NOCK, ma bụrụ onye otu ruo mgbe ọ ga-apụ na October 2019
Mangi lụrụ Martin Mbogo, onye njikwa Tullow Oil Kenya
